name: monkeyset
description: A lightweight and performance based OHLCV data manager

scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:create && git add README.md docs && git commit -m "docs update" && git push origin development
scripts.release:major: git add -A && git commit -m "Version bump major" && npm version major && git tag "%npm_package_version%" && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: git add -A && git commit -m "Version bump minor" && npm version minor && git tag "%npm_package_version%" && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: git add -A && git commit -m "Version bump patch" && npm version patch && git tag "%npm_package_version%" && git push --tags && npm publish
